column4: hi, i have gnoppix 0.8.2.2 now (i've used 0.6.0-rc2 before) a there isn't mplayer, what can i use to play movies?
thx, i didn't know about totem, but it can't play it ("don't know how to handle video/x-divx... audio/mpeg...")
probably because it's using totem-gstreamer and doesn't have w32codecs
